text:
6
NEWSLETTERS
East West Center News. University of Hawaii, Honolulu, Hawaii.
Published every other month.
Educational Television Bulletin. Southern Regional Education Board,
130 Sixth Street, N.W., Atlanta 13, Georgia. Published every month
ETV Report. South Carolina Educational Television Network, 2712
Millwood Avenue, Columbia, South Carolina. Published six times a
year.
Great Plains Regional Instructional Television Library. University
of Nebraska, Lincoln, Nebraska.
Kentucky Authority for Educational Television Newsletter. 1220
South Broadway, Lexington, Kentucky. Published quarterly.
NAEB Newsletter. National Association of Educational Broadcasters,
119 Gregory Hall, Urbana, Illinois. Published every month.
Ohio Educational Television Network News. The Ohio Educational
Television Network Commission, Room 302, 79 East State Street,
Columbus 2, Ohio. Published every month.
RCA Educational Television News. Broadcast Marketing Department,
RCA Educational Electronics, Camden 2, New Jersey. Published every
month.
TEMP. Texas Educational Microwave Project, Box 7158, Austin, Texas
Published every month.
